casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Edward M. ALONZO 288PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 4, 2019 Daniel K. Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Alonzo, Edward M.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Ellen A. Newby, Assistant Attorney General, Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of January 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of January 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 6th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
